text: A number of steamships have been named the after the Rimutaka Mountains in New Zealand: * , a 4,473-ton three-masted sail and steam ship operated by the New Zealand Shipping Company until 1899 * , a 7,765-ton liner of the New Zealand Shipping Company, operated until 1929 * , a passenger-cargo ocean liner owned by P&O; and operated by the New Zealand Shipping Company 1938–1950 (formerly the SS Rimutaka 1884 Category:Ship names
title: SS Rimutaka
